data.message: Last night was my 1st time at Reading x Probably 1 of the best days of my life x All these people hating on you who cares there are far more important things in life x You were there to entertain your fans and you did you were awesome x I hope I get the chance to see u again x And if you don't want your set to be shown live that's your choice it really doesn't matter x Being you and standing up for what you believe in does 🖕
